channel.title: Help! logging out!

item.title: Help! logging out!
item.dc:creator: @Patrickftw Patrickftw
item.description:
@Patrickftw wrote:

I tried to make it so when someone is in combat they have to wait 10 seconds to log out…but…I can’t find out how to get it to work…=[

					case 9154: //Log out
                                        {
					if (LogoutDelay >= 10)
					{
					sendMessage("You must wait 10 seconds after combat to log out!");
					}
					else if (LogoutDelay == 0)
					{
						logout();
						savefile = true;
                                        }
					}

Tried changing the log out delay to 10…
Didn’t work.

When i change else if (LogoutDelay == 0)
to 10…it wont log out at all…

Read full topic
